name: Thieves Almanac Vol. (Very Rare)
entries: This tome contains the secrets to skullduggery and crime.
It can be read over 1 week to reduce the heat of a creature to 0. Alternatively, a creature reading it can instead read the book to increase their Theft, Guard Duty, or Gambling labor tier by 3.
Once this book has been used in this way 4 times it becomes no longer magical. Reading the book can be done during leisure time and does not require the use of downtime.
